meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I overdrank all the juice in the fridge.
meanings.sent2: She overdrank at the party and felt sick the next day.
meanings.sent3: He overdrank the water so quickly that he got brain freeze.
meanings.sent4: The plants in the garden overdrank the rainwater and wilted.
meanings.sent5: The athlete overdrank the energy drink before the race, hoping for a boost.

meanings.sent1: After the game, the team overdrank water to cool down.
meanings.sent2: They overdrank soda and ended up with a stomachache.
meanings.sent3: The cat overdrank the milk and left none for the kittens.
meanings.sent4: The river overdrank the rainfall and flooded the town.
meanings.sent5: The child overdrank the juice box and had to go to the bathroom frequently.
